creature.title: Abyssal Maw
creature.hpnote: Has no healing surges, but you can expend yours for effects that allow the summoned creature to expend one
creature.defenses: Your defenses, not counting temporary bonuses

block.name: Snapping Jaws
block.line: Enemies grant combat advantage while in the aura.

block.name: Standard Action
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); Intelligence +3 vs. AC
Hit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier damage. On a critical hit, the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

block.name: Minor Action
block.line: Effect: The creature either walks, steps, stands up, squeezes, or crawls.

block.name: Opportunity Interrupt
block.line: Trigger: A creature adjacent to the abyssal maw provokes an opportunity attack
Effect: The abyssal maw makes its melee basic attack against the triggering creature. This counts as an opportunity attack.

block.name: Immediate Reaction
block.line: Trigger: A creature adjacent to the abyssal maw makes an attack that doesn't target it
Effect: The abyssal maw makes its melee basic attack against the triggering creature.

block.name: Instinctive Action
block.line: If you haven't given the abyssal maw any commands by the end of your turn, its aura affects all creatures and it attacks an adjacent creature. If it can't do that, it moves its speed towards the nearest creature.
If the abyssal maw cannot attack or move adjacent to an enemy, enemies gain a +2 bonus to triggered attack rolls against you until the start of your next turn.

block.name: Symbiosis
block.line: You deal +1d6 additional damage with melee and ranged attacks against enemies in the abyssal maw's aura.

creature.title: Dretch
creature.hpnote: Has no healing surges, but you can expend yours for effects that allow the summoned creature to expend one
creature.defenses: Your defenses, not counting temporary bonuses

block.name: Standard Action
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 (one or two creatures); Intelligence +2 vs. AC
Hit: 1d4 + Intelligence modifier damage.

block.name: Minor Action
block.line: Effect: The creature either walks, steps, stands up, squeezes, or crawls.

block.name: Nonaction Interrupt
block.line: Trigger: The dretch is reduced to 0 hit points or less
Effect: Close burst 1; The burst creates a zone of vile miasma until the start of the next turn of the creature that reduced the dretch's hit points.
A nondemon that ends its turn in the zone or enters it takes 5 poison damage. A creature can only take this damage once per turn.

block.name: Instinctive Action
block.line: If you haven't given the dretch any commands by the end of your turn, it attacks or charges the nearest creature, using the above attack in place of a melee basic attack.

If the dretch cannot attack or charge a creature, it moves its speed towards the closest creature and you have vulnerable 5 to all damage for the first time you take damage before the end of your next turn.

block.name: Symbiosis
block.line: You gain combat advantage against any creature that the dretch has attacked until the end of your next turn.

creature.title: Dust Devil
creature.hpnote: Has no healing surges, but you can expend yours for effects that allow the summoned creature to expend one
creature.defenses: Your defenses, not counting temporary bonuses
creature.defmod: +2 to all defenses against attacks triggered by movement when not slowed
-2 to all defenses while slowed or immobilized

block.name: Standard Action
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); Intelligence vs. Reflex
Hit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the dust devil slides the target 2 squares.
Effect: The dust devil shifts 1 square, or 2 squares if it scored a critical hit.

block.name: Standard Action
block.line: Attack: Close burst 3 (enemies in the burst); Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of the dust devil's next turn.
Miss: Half damage.

block.name: Move Action
block.recharge: when the dust devil is critically hit
block.line: Effect: The dust devil shifts up to 5 squares. The first time it moves adjacent to an enemy during the move, it makes the following attack against that enemy:
Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit: The target falls prone

block.name: Minor Action
block.line: Effect: The creature either walks, steps, stands up, squeezes, or crawls.

block.name: Instinctive Action
block.line: If you haven't given the dust devil any commands by the end of your turn, it attacks an adjacent creature. If it can't do that, it moves its speed adjacent to the creature furthest away from it that it can reach.
If the dust devil cannot attack or move adjacent to an enemy, you fall prone.

block.name: Symbiosis
block.line: You gain a +2 power bonus to speed, and a +2 bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by your movement.

creature.title: Fire Warrior
creature.hpnote: Has no healing surges, but you can expend yours for effects that allow the summoned creature to expend one
creature.defenses: Your defenses, not counting temporary bonuses

block.name: Standard Action
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); Intelligence +2 vs. AC
Hit: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.

block.name: Minor Action
block.line: Effect: The creature either walks, steps, stands up, squeezes, or crawls.

block.name: Opportunity Interrupt
block.line: Trigger: A creature adjacent to the fire warrior provokes an opportunity attack
Effect: The fire warrior makes its melee basic attack against the triggering creature. This counts as an opportunity attack.

block.name: Instinctive Action
block.line: If you haven't given the fire warrior any commands by the end of your turn, it attacks an adjacent creature. If it can't do that, it moves its speed toward the nearest creature.
If the fire warrior cannot attack or move adjacent to an enemy, you gain vulnerable 5 fire until the start of your next turn.

block.name: Symbiosis
block.line: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against enemies adjacent to the fire warrior.

creature.title: Imp
creature.hpnote: Has no healing surges, but you can expend yours for effects that allow the summoned creature to expend one
creature.defenses: Your defenses, not counting temporary bonuses

block.name: Standard Action
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); Intelligence +2 vs. AC

Hit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends). The imp becomes invisible invisible until the start of your next turn, or the end of your next turn on a critical hit.

block.name: Minor Action
block.line: Effect: The imp becomes invisible until the end of your next turn or until it has made an attack, whichever comes first.

block.name: Minor Action
block.line: Effect: The creature either walks, steps, stands up, squeezes, or crawls.

block.name: Intrinsic Nature
block.line: If you haven't given the imp any commands by the end of your turn, it attacks an enemy that grants it combat advantage. If it can't do that, it turns invisible until the start of your next turn and moves its speed to a square adjacent to an enemy.
You grant combat advantage to all enemies until the start of your next turn.

block.name: Symbiosis
block.line: You deal an additional +1d6 poison damage with attacks when your target grants you combat advantage.

creature.title: Magma Beast
creature.hpnote: Has no healing surges, but you can expend yours for effects that allow the summoned creature to expend one
creature.defenses: Your defenses, not counting temporary bonuses

block.name: Obsidian Crust
block.line: When the magma beast takes cold damage, it is slowed until the end of its next turn and doesn't benefit from its bonus to speed when charging.
The magma beast automatically ends any slowing or immobilizing conditions on itself if an effect would deal fire damage to it, even if the damage is reduced to 0 by its resistance.

block.name: Standard Action
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, and the target is covered with magma (save ends).
While covered, the target takes ongoing 5 fire damage and is slowed.

block.name: Standard Action
block.line: The magma beast charges the closest enemy.

block.name: Minor Action
block.line: Effect: The creature either walks, steps, stands up, squeezes, or crawls.

block.name: Intrinsic Nature
block.line: If you haven't given the magma beast any commands by the end of your turn, it attacks an adjacent creature or charges the nearest creature it can charge. Otherwise it moves its speed toward the nearest enemy.
If the magma beast couldn't attack or charge, you are slowed until the end of your turn.

block.name: Symbiosis
block.line: When you step, you can shift 2 squares instead of 1 square.

creature.title: Shadow Beast
creature.hpnote: Has no healing surges, but you can expend yours for effects that allow the summoned creature to expend one
creature.defenses: Your defenses, not counting temporary bonuses

block.name: Insubstantial
block.line: The shadow beast takes half damage from any damage source, except those that deal radiant damage.

block.name: Standard Action
block.line: Attack: Melee 2 (one creature); Intelligence vs. Reflex
Hit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage.
Effect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

block.name: Standard Action
block.line: Effect: The shadow beast charges a bloodied enemy.

block.name: Minor Action
block.line: Effect: The creature either walks, steps, stands up, squeezes, or crawls.

block.name: Immediate Reaction
block.line: Trigger: The beast takes damage
Effect: The beast creates a zone of shadows in a close burst 1.
The zone is heavily obscured for creatures other than the beast and you.

block.name: Instinctive Action
block.line: If you haven't given the shadow beast any commands by the end of your turn, it attacks a bloodied creature in its reach, or any creature in its reach if no bloodied creature is within its reach. Otherwise it moves its speed towards the nearest creature.
If the shadow does does not attack any creature, all creatures have concealment from you until the end of your next turn.

block.name: Symbiosis
block.line: On your turn, if you move at least 3 squares away from where you started your turn, you gain concealment until the end of your next turn.

creature.title: Shadow Serpent
creature.hpnote: Has no healing surges, but you can expend yours for effects that allow the summoned creature to expend one
creature.defenses: Your defenses, not counting temporary bonuses

block.name: Stealthy
block.line: The serpent gains a +5 bonus to Stealth checks you make for it, and it takes no penalty to the checks for moving more than 2 squares.

block.name: Minor Action
block.line: Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you can see through the serpent's eyes. The serpent has darkvision, which you also gain.
You cannot gain line of sight or line of effect for your powers from the serpent's space, but you can make Perception checks from it.

block.name: Minor Action
block.line: Effect: The creature either walks, steps, stands up, squeezes, or crawls.

block.name: Instinctive Action
block.line: If you haven't given the shadow serpent any commands by the end of your turn, it moves up to its speed to a square where it can hide.
If the shadow serpent does not end this move in a space that is either not lit or only dimly lit, you take a -2 penalty to Perception checks until the end of your next turn.

block.name: Symbiosis
block.line: You gain a +2 power bonus to Stealth checks.

creature.title: Shadow Wraith
creature.hpnote: Has no healing surges, but you can expend yours for effects that allow the summoned creature to expend one
creature.defenses: Your defenses, not counting temporary bonuses

block.name: Insubstantial
block.line: The shadow wraith takes half damage from damage any source, except those that deal radiant damage.

block.name: Fateful Death
block.line: Bloodied enemies grant combat advantage while in the aura.
If an enemy drops to 0 hit points or less in the aura, it dies and the wraith gains temporary hit points equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

block.name: Standard Action
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage, and the target is weakened until the start of your next turn.

block.name: Minor Action
block.line: Effect: The creature either walks, steps, stands up, squeezes, or crawls.

block.name: Instinctive Action
block.line: If you have not given the shadow wraith any commands by the end of your turn, it attacks a bloodied enemy adjacent to it. Otherwise it moves its speed towards you.
If the wraith does not attack any creature, you are weakened until the end of your next turn.

block.name: Symbiosis
block.line: When an enemy ends its turn adjacent to you and within the wraith's aura, you can use an opportunity reaction to deal necrotic damage to it. The damage equals 5 + your Wisdom modifier.

creature.title: Skeletal Warrior
creature.hpnote: Has no healing surges, but you can expend yours for effects that allow the summoned creature to expend one
creature.defenses: Your defenses, not counting temporary bonuses

block.name: Standard Action
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); Intelligence +3 vs. AC
Hit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target cannot shift until the end of your next turn.

block.name: Minor Action
block.line: Effect: The creature either walks, steps, stands up, squeezes, or crawls.

block.name: Opportunity Interrupt
block.line: Trigger: An enemy adjacent to the skeletal warrior provokes an opportunity attack

Effect: The skeletal warrior makes its melee basic attack against the triggering creature, and has a +2 bonus to the attack roll and deals an additional +1d6 damage. This counts as an opportunity attack.

block.name: Instinctive Action
block.line: If you have not given the skeletal warrior any commands by the end of your turn, it attacks an enemy adjacent to it, or any creature adjacent to it if no enemy is adjacent. Otherwise it moves its speed towards the nearest creature.

If you did not give the it commands, until the start of your next turn, the skeletal warrior uses its triggered action against your allies unless you use an opportunity interrupt to stop it each time.

block.name: Symbiosis
block.line: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls with opportunity attacks.
